ValidationRule.description: Mandate WOC reason field when agents moves case to WOC
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( DateValue(CreatedDate) > Date(2022, 08,02 ), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Technical_Support'), ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Waiting for Customer Response'), ISPICKVAL(WOC_Reason__c, '') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Missing a WOC Reason, a Case Reason, or a Close Case Reason.
